welcome_message_body: Welcome to the charming city of Putatan, known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our vibrant city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, this terminal primarily serves Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.
